header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Logs, upholstering, travelling from Tokyo, next door neighbours, new restaurant, the budget, log burners, fudge, antique shop, cats and dogs, school academies, work, outsourcing to India, mashed potato, family.
